query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_badges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  badgeId INT NOT NULL,
  earnedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_badge (userId, badgeId)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute 
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_badges (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  badgeId INT NOT NULL,
  earnedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_user_badge (userId, badgeId)
);
